title: Old images appeared in recent images (in files).info says theyve been modified. Have I been hacked?
content: On whatsapp I noticed 4 old photos in "recent" which I didn't send or received recently. They were random and not in the order they were taken. Then I noticed that in Google "files" on my phone there were plenty more old photos, random and out of order under "recent". When I click "photo info" it says they're still in their original location in the album and says "modified". You can see in photo attached the files names(dates). Should I be worried I've been hacked? Is there another explanation? Please help!
